90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Claude,
So nice speaking with you today. In order to run the numbers I need to know your county of residence for the MD tax form. Once I have that I will send you a net cash estimate that we can review via phone and explore which option will be the most adventatgous for you.
Best regards, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDE Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6028 f: 703.793.6068 e: sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Claude Wright [mailto:buddy8304@cablespeed.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2012 4:29 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: FW: Position ID:SMD_SrPgm_045
Below is a sample email that I receive on a daily basis. In this case, which would be a better deal for me if I employed your services as a C2C?
Regards, Claude Wright
From: Milen Petkov [mailto:milenp@vgroupinc.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2012 11:26 AM To: Claude Wright Subject: RE: Position ID:SMD_SrPgm_045

The rate is $56h W2 or $65h C2C.
Regards,
Milen Petkov
